thread.section_title: Postme Anmeldelser | Kundernes anmeldelser af Postme | www.postme.com | 2 af 68
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text:
Once in a while you just "get it" some great friendly service that even has a joke with you- what a great pleasure. Called and asked if I could pick up in 30 minutes, the lovely girl said I better check to avoid a wasted journey, she replied that they had 88 in stock and there probably would be enough left by the time I arrived ( I was after a nose hair trimmer!)
I arrived and it was all ready to go, I needed something else on impulse whilst I was there, it was for my son and some hairwax, I called him and he fell off the chair with how cheap it was. All in all a great customer friendly experience with great prices to match- utopia at last!
